backend/main.mo: Defines core types and state maps for profiles, attendance, homework, fees, and messages, plus helper authorization and role-checking functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping implemented features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for documentation or build-planning use.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint including PWA metadata, manifest link, icons, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, start URL, display mode, and icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Static offline fallback page displayed when the app cannot load due to no network connection.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching static assets and providing offline navigation fallback handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuration with authentication gate, route definitions, and layout wrappers.
frontend/src/components/AppInfoDialog.ts: Provides a dialog to view the app URL, copy it, and install the PWA, using clipboard and install prompt hooks.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, navigation actions, notifications panel toggle, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPane: Displays a slide‑in panel showing fetched messages, with offline warnings and a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt events, exposing install capability and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, messages, attendance, and other backend data with toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with global base styles and print visibility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ChairpersonLogin.tsx: Renders a chairperson login form storing phone and role before triggering Internet Identity login.
Displays chairperson dashboard stats and a table of all user profiles using query hooks.
Shows non‑teaching staff dashboard with announcements and offline status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardStudentParen: Presents student dashboard with attendance, homework, fees, and print‑ID functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardTeacher.tsx: Provides teacher dashboard with class info, attendance marking, and homework creation.
frontend/src/pages/PhoneOtpLogin.tsx: Handles phone‑based login for any role, storing role and phone before Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page that loads the user’s profile, allows editing name and address, saves changes, and supports undoing the last update.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileCompletion.tsx: Initial profile setup form that collects name and address, saves the profile, and redirects to the appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelection.tsx: Landing page that displays role options and navigates the user to login with the selected role.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, image requirements, and new feature requests.
